subs.text: @PhDVoice @briandavidearp @PostdocVoice 1) A PhD is a test of endurance not intelligence—if you are in the program you are smart enough to be there; 2) Think of your dissertation as 7 or 8 term 25-30 page papers (and you regularly write 3 of these a semester); 3) Your dissertation is not your magnum opus.
subs.rawText: @PhDVoice @briandavidearp @PostdocVoice 1) A PhD is a test of endurance not intelligence—if you are in the program you are smart enough to be there; 2) Think of your dissertation as 7 or 8 term 25-30 page papers (and you regularly write 3 of these a semester); 3) Your dissertation is not your magnum opus.
